title: Dark Knight in Disguise IV
description: Erick and Hollianne's dance was over, and they were both ready for the serious stuff. Like moths to flame, they could not avoid the sexual attraction that bound them to each other. And when the first hunger had been appeased, they were again onto another dance--how would Hollianne feel when she finds out about Erick's secret? Erick has fallen deeply and irrevocably and he decided that he was going to tell Hollianne what she needed to know about him. She was the best thing that ever happened to him in his entire existence. She was the answer to her most important questions about humanity. And she was the reason now about why he wanted to continue living as he was.But what if she didn't believe him? Worse, what if she thought him insane and she got scared enough to run? Would he be able to get through this test?Or as a human, would he finally experience what this race knew as hell?Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: This story contains content that may include sex and has erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
